H0.text: Astigmatism is a condition affecting which part of the body. Brain

H1.text: Astigmatism is a condition affecting which part of the body. Ear

H2.text: Astigmatism is a condition affecting which part of the body. Skin

H3.text: Astigmatism is a condition affecting which part of the body. Eye

A4.text: Astigmatism is a type of refractive error due to rotational asymmetry in the eye's refractive power.

A5.text: The main cause of astigmatism is changes in the curvature of the cornea.
